content: आर्तव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वा वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ऋतुरस्य प्राप्तः, अण्] {@--1@} Conforming or relating to the season; seasonal; अभिभूय विभूतिमार्तवीं <ls>R. 8. 36</ls>, स्वयमंगेषु ममेदमार्तवं <ls>Ku. 4. 68</ls>; <ls>V. 1. 13</ls>; vernal; <ls>R. 9. 28</ls>, <ls n="R. 9.">48.</ls> {@--2@} Menstrual, relating to or produced by this discharge. --वः A section of the year, a combination of several seasons (<ab>Ved.</ab>). --वी A mare. --वं {@--1@} The menstrual discharge (of women); नोपगच्छेत्प्रमत्तोऽपि स्त्रियमार्तवदर्शने <ls>Ms. 4. 40</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 48.</ls> {@--2@} Certain days after menstrual discharge, favourable to conception. {@--3@} A flower.
